title: ARAM Changes
body:
It would be interesting to know what member of the Riot Games development staff thought that the summoner spell "Mark" would be a good addition to ARAM?
Introduction of a special event gap closer to a main game format is quite possibly the stupidest decision that Riot has made. What moron thought it would be good to do that?

replies.body:
It's a good change, the best change they could have done.

A team full of melee whoever has a very hard time winning against 2 tanks and 3 ranged AP and AD carries with tons of poke. 

inb4 some bronzelord says "just go in and stop getting poked hurr!!!"
Gives melee a chance to get into the fight without losing all their health from poke beforehand

I reckon you are 100% wrong on that call. I believe that in a game mode where consistency gets thrown out the window at champ select, people should have very few consistent things. Before, being stuck with a couple melee bruisers with no engage tool was pretty much GG. However, this new summoner spell offers a consistent engage and encourages the only good thing about ARAM; team fights.

Who's up for a game of ARAM ball? {{summoner:31}}
You seem like you're just butthurt. I love the new "Mark" summoner spell. It adds more variety to the mode.

I absolutely agree with you -- I don't know what they were thinking. Make it a separate game mode and see how it goes? That's one thing, but adding it into ARAM... it's just one big snow ball fight now.
